name: Escape From YogLabs
description:
Escape From YogLabs is a   physics based    puzzle   platformer made for Yogscast Game Jam 2021 with the theme Opposites. Can you help the strange bunny looking creature escape to freedom, or will you forever be trapped inside? You have the ability to become small and heavy or large and light. Use your abilities to escape!

Credits:

Lead:  Mic1211 

2nd Programmer: BB754

Artist:  Roca Teithmore

Level Designer:   Slychaos

Music: Eoin 

3rd  Level Design: LittleDJ808  (Mic1211's brother)
